alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 3:09AM AKST until March 04 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
